macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Major Indices Show Bullish Technical Outlook on December 30
items.summary: DJIA (US30), S&P 500 (US500), and NASDAQ futures exhibit bullish momentum with potential pullbacks to key pivots before advancing to resistance levels. DXY remains bearish while GBPUSD and other pairs lean bullish.

items.title: NASDAQ Closes Down 118 Points at 23,474 Amid High Volume
items.summary: The NASDAQ declined 118 points to close at 23,474 with 6.7 billion shares traded, up from Friday, and 68% of stocks declining. This tempers expectations for a Santa Claus rally.

items.title: Asian Equity Indices Steady to Slightly Higher
items.summary: Asian markets opened broadly steady to slightly higher on Tuesday, with Hong Kong's Hang Seng gaining about 0.4%. No major macro or central bank developments reported.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Struggles to Bounce as Year Ends, Hovering $20,000 Below Trump Election Peak
items.summary: Bitcoin is experiencing chaotic price action near the end of 2025, trading significantly lower than levels seen when Donald Trump took office, with traders anticipating 2026 developments.

items.title: Ethereum Price Tightens in Narrow Range with Clear Resistance Overhead
items.summary: Ethereum is consolidating within a tight band as moving averages compress near a key pivot point, facing overhead resistance.

items.title: ETH, ADA, and SOL Slip Amid Year-End Selling Pressure
items.summary: Ethereum, Cardano, and Solana are declining as year-end selling continues, while Bitcoin traders eye potential bets in the $80,000 to $100,000 range.

items.title: Crypto Market Mixed: ZRX Surges 26%, MANTA and POLYX Gain 11% and 8%
items.summary: Major cryptocurrencies show mixed performance, with outperformers ZRX up 26%, MANTA 11%, and POLYX 8%.

items.title: Gold and Silver Outperform Bitcoin as 2025's Key Protectors Against Fiat
items.summary: Gold and silver have surpassed Bitcoin in performance throughout 2025, emerging as preferred hedges against paper money.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Insilico Medicine Lists on Hong Kong Stock Exchange in 2025's Largest Biotech IPO
items.summary: Insilico Medicine, an AI drug discovery company, completed its listing on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange on December 30, 2025, marking the largest Hong Kong biotech IPO of the year and demonstrating momentum in AI-driven pharmaceutical development.

items.title: Cube Bench Benchmark Reveals Limitations in AI Spatial Reasoning
items.summary: Researchers from Monash University introduced Cube Bench, a novel benchmark for evaluating spatial and sequential reasoning in multimodal AI models using Rubik's Cube solving tasks, revealing significant performance gaps between closed-source and open-weight models on complex problem-solving.

items.title: Samsung Advances 6G AI/ML Research for Physical-Layer Applications
items.summary: Samsung Research published technical advances in applying AI and machine learning to 6G physical-layer communications, specifically focusing on CSI (Channel State Information) compression with JSCM technology.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Epic Games Store Reveals Viewfinder as Free Game for December 29-30
items.summary: The Epic Games Store has made Viewfinder, a first-person puzzle platformer, available for free as part of its 2025 holiday giveaway, claimable only until December 30. This is the 13th title in the ongoing daily free game promotion running through the end of the year.[1][2]

items.title: Zenless Zone Zero 2.5 Update Maintenance Scheduled
items.summary: Zenless Zone Zero version 2.5 maintenance begins December 30 at 6 AM UTC+8, lasting 5 hours until 11 AM UTC+8, introducing new content including a free S-Rank agent Zhao. For American servers, this falls on December 29.[7]

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
